mapper.select: select dc.id,dc.`name` from devops_cluster dc where dc.skip_check_project_permission is true UNION select dc.id,dc.`name` from devops_cluster dc join devops_cluster_pro_permission dcp on dc.id = dcp.cluster_id where dcp.project_id = #{projectId}
mapper.update: UPDATE devops_cluster dc set dc.skip_check_project_permission = #{skipCheckPro} where dc.id = #{clusterId}
